about_the_game:
We are a two-person team passionate about tower defense and auto-battler games. We've created a turn-based tower defense game inspired by Chinese mythology and Eastern legends using 『CliCli』. We hope you enjoy the game and look forward to your support and feedback!

Features:

Enjoy flexible, randomized recruitment mechanics with three tiers of hero cards and various synergy options to strengthen your tower.

Take on challenges and defeat elite enemies to earn rewards, unlock bounty missions, and maximize your profits.

Focus on reward monsters to test your team’s output, enhancing the power and star ratings of your faction’s 'Hero Towers' through an evolving economy. Defeat relentless beasts and become a legend!

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 | AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600

short_description: Mystic Tower Legends** is an Eastern fantasy-themed, turn-based tower defense game created with the game editing tool 『CliCli』. Recruit legendary heroes from various mythologies, empower them, and strategize to defeat your foes!
